item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 10 Nov 2020
item.description:
1. OCaml native library to draw, scale, rotate shapes on screen
  2. GuaCaml.0.02 : A Generic Unspecific Algorithmic in OCaml
  3. Snowflake : a Generic Symbolic Dynamic Programming framework
  4. Using CLI arguments through modules and configuration files
  5. Multicore OCaml: October 2020
  6. Other OCaml News
